data.eml:eml: Chrysosplenium ramosissimum Y. I. Kim & Y. D. Kim (Saxifragaceae), a new species from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Yong-In, Cho, Seong-Hyun, Lee, Jung-Hoon, Kang, Dae-Hyun, Jin Hee Park,, Kim, Young-Dong (2018): Chrysosplenium ramosissimum Y. I. Kim & Y. D. Kim (Saxifragaceae), a new species from Korea. PhytoKeys 111: 1-10, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.27182, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.27182
